title: Business Glossary for Financial Fraud Analysis
description: A schema for validating entries in a business glossary related to financial fraud analysis.

conceptID.description: A unique identifier for the concept.

prefLabel.description: The preferred label of the concept.

altLabels.description: A list of alternative labels for the concept.

definition.description: A clear and concise definition of the concept.

inScheme.description: The name of the scheme the concept is part of.

topConceptOf.description: Indicates if the concept is the top concept of a scheme.

narrower.description: List of conceptIDs that are narrower concepts of this concept.
